comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.body:
Hi Hiroaki,

Thanks for the patch.  I will apply the doc changes, but please don't combine other functionality into a patch (my guess is you still had some of the other NGram patches applied)

Thanks,
Grant

comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
comments.body: committed, minus the >1024 clause.  Also removed existing author tags.

description: To clarify what "edge" means, I added some description. That edge means the beggining edge of a term or ending edge of a term.
